description:
Grab three friends and head into the wilderness. There's room for everyone and their stuff thanks to double vestibules and plenty of internal organizer pockets. The tent uses durable fabrics, has a waterproof polyurethane coating and full seam sealing, so it can stand up to any rainstorm. At 3 and a half kilo’s it's light enough to carry into the backcountry, but spacious enough to work at drive-up campgrounds too.

  • Made of durable nylon and polyester with a polyurethane coating and full seam taping so rain can't sneak in
  • Two oversized doors and two vestibules for gear storage and late-night exits
  • High-low ventilation keeps air moving for breathability and less condensation
  • Pre-bent pole design creates steep walls for greater internal volume
  • X-tent design with symmetrical poles and user-friendly clips for easy setup
  • Internal organization pockets and ceiling pockets keep essentials close at hand
  • Includes aluminum stakes, guylines and stuff sack
  • Footprint available to extend the life of your tent and allows a canopy-free lightweight setup. (sold separately)
name: The North Face Trail Lite 4-Person Tent
